name: The cursed tower (itch)
description:
In this game you are a cursed tower wich wants to dominate the world. But there is a problem, you are not the only one. You will have to defeat other towers with your units and try to become the best tower.

The game is an strategy based game were you fight against the machine in one vs one battle.

Please ignore the text in the html in the downloaded version is better implemented.
